conversation.content: I got an email saying my account was suspended, so...
Oh! Yes, okay so let me pull that up for you right away—what's the email on the account?
It's jmitchell at promail dot com. I don't really...
Got it got it, so I'm seeing account ID USR-4492-BNX here, and hmm, let me see here... okay so there's a flag from our security team dated yesterday at 11:47 PM.
Security team? I mean, what did I even...

Right so basically what happens is—the system detected unusual activity patterns, and so it triggered an automatic suspension protocol, code SEC-77-ABNORMAL, which is like our standard procedure when we see certain things.
Unusual activity. Okay. What kind of unusual...
Let me check the specifics! So the log shows—okay so there were 47 login attempts from different IP addresses within a 3-hour window, all from different countries.
Wait, different countries? That's... are you sure that's my account?
Yep yep, definitely your account, USR-4492-BNX, and actually wait—let me see here... were you traveling recently? Or maybe using a VPN?
VPN. Yeah, for work. Is that... does that matter?
Oh! Okay so that explains it! So basically when you use a VPN it can look like you're logging in from everywhere, and our system sees that as potential unauthorized access.
So my account got suspended because I was doing my job...
I know I know, it's not ideal! But so here's the good news—I can start the reactivation process right now, case number RCT-9981-KLP, takes about 15 minutes to process.
Fifteen minutes. And then everything's back to normal, or...?

So once it's reactivated—which again, 15 minutes max—you'll get a confirmation email with a temporary password, starts with TMP and then 8 digits, and you'll just need to reset that when you log back in.
Do I need to do anything special about the VPN situation going forward?

Great question! So basically what I'm gonna do is—let me add a note here... okay so I'm whitelisting your VPN usage pattern under exception code EXC-VPN-APPROVED, which means this shouldn't happen again.
Okay. That's... I guess that works then...
Perfect perfect! So you'll get that email within 15 minutes to jmitchell at promail dot com, and if you have any issues logging back in, just reference case RCT-9981-KLP and we'll sort it right out!

scenario: asking why their account was suspended without warning
